widget.description: Generates a list of the most popular categories, ordered by hitcount, for the vertical areas of the template.

setting.name: TITLE
setting.info: This title shows at top of the widget's generated content.

setting.name: NUMBER OF CATEGORIES
setting.info: Fill in how many of the popular categories should be listed.

setting.name: CACHE RESULTS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the results to be cached, "No" if not.
